name: Hall of Spawning
text: You wake up in a dark, damp corridor. You have nothing but your hands to scratch away at the walls in a desperate attempt at orienting yourself in this unfamiliar place. The whole room smells of fungi and humidity, and you feel cold. After getting a hang of where you are, you notice two hallways at the end, one to the left, and one to the right.

choices.title: Follow the hallway to the right
Follow the hallway to the left
